name: Mirror Mortis
description:
Mirror Mortis is a game about vampires and mirrors. Explore your way through a castle full of secrets and puzzles on your quest to find a nice place for a nap.

  • Multiple playable characters
  • A huge castle (and surrounding area) to explore
  • Spooky enemies, including a few boss fights
  • Controller support

The game was born as Ludum Dare 32 entry called Miroir du Mort. We've worked hard to expand on our original idea and give the concept the attention we think it deserved. Thanks to the Ludum Dare community for encouraging us and offering their feedback!

Windows only right now!

For questions or comments, please contact support@graemeborland.com, or get in touch with @graebor on twitter.

Art by Amy Gerardy

Code by Graeme Borland

Music by Kevin MacLeod, Malcolm Borland and Amy Gerardy

Malcolm's tracks from the game are available to stream here and here.
